monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Dominance
skills.description: Aura: Enemies receive 3% increased damage for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Full Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (200 + 40% Magic) Applies Glory, Barrier, Channel & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory, Sidekick & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (200 + 30% Magic) Shield target for 4 x (200 + 30% Defense) Removes 6 Debuffs

skills.name: Goblin Recovery
skills.description: Aura: All Goblins in the party have 15% increased Mana Regeneration and gain a random Buff at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Hades
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff) or Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (60 + 20% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (85 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (100 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (130 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Mastery
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) are increased by 20%.

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Every hit has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Lightning Bolt
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 80% (240%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Lightning Bolt Lvl 5
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (wind)

skills.name: Magic Penetration
skills.description: Aura: Mage Monsters in the party ignore 15% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Magical Resistance
skills.description: Magical damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Mana Conflux
skills.description: Throughout combat, gain a Charge stack for every 75 Mana spent by any allied Monster.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mass Restore
skills.description: Heal all for (200 + 70% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (175 + 40% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Mass Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (250 + 50% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Mentor
skills.description: Whenever this Monster uses a single-target skill on an ally, they gain 2 random Buffs.

skills.name: Multi Barrier
skills.description: Aura: Barrier (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Poison
skills.description: Aura: Poison (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Occult Power
skills.description: Grants target Goblin or Occult Monster 4 random Buffs and a shield equal to 40% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Phoenix Affinity
skills.description: When this Monster is knocked out for the first time in combat, it is revived with 10% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Bomb Lvl 5
skills.description: 3 x 155% (465%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 200% magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Poison Cloud Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Purify
skills.description: Healing actions also remove 4 harmful Stacks (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether). Multi-Target-Heals remove 2.

skills.name: Shocking Current
skills.description: Every Wind attack hit has a 15% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Sidekick
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Sidekick Support
skills.description: Unique Aura: Healing, Shield and Buffing actions are now also affected by Sidekick Buff - triggering additional heals (40% magic), shields (40% defense) or buffs.

skills.name: Supremacy
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an allied Monster applies a Debuff, it gains 2 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Teamplay
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Teamplay Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Teamplay Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sidekick & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Thunder Strike
skills.description: 1 x 370% magical damage (wind) Deals additional 3 x 20% (60%)  damage if the target has Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunder Strike Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 460% magical damage (wind) Deals additional 4 x 20% (80%)  damage if the target has Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Thunderstorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.name: Toxic Reaction
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy receives Shock damage, there is a 40% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Warlock Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Poison, Weakness or Armor Break on a random enemy.
